CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With a weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM is 1 : 3.5 , a PCE of 4.2% with a V oc of 0.96 V , a J sc of 7.6 mA / cm^2 , and an FF of 0.56 was achieved under illumination from an AM 1.5G solar simulator ( 100 mW cm^-2 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

The two "Material Name" entities found in the paragraph are "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

After reevaluating the paragraph, the previously identified material names, PSFDTBT and PC71BM, still remain as the only clear "Material Name" entities.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With a weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM is 1 : 3.5 , a PCE of 4.2% with a V oc of 0.96 V , a J sc of 7.6 mA / cm^2 , and an FF of 0.56 was achieved under illumination from an AM 1.5G solar simulator ( 100 mW cm^-2 ).

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM |
| PCE |
| V oc |
| J sc |
| FF |

These entities represent different properties mentioned in the paragraph, such as the weight ratio of two materials, power conversion efficiency (PCE), open-circuit voltage (V oc), short-circuit current density (J sc), and fill factor (FF).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| weight ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM |
| PCE |
| V oc |
| J sc |
| FF |

These entities represent different properties of materials mentioned in the paragraph, such as the weight ratio of two materials, power conversion efficiency (PCE), open-circuit voltage (V oc), short-circuit current density (J sc), and fill factor (FF).
